traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Portia can regain 20 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The champion makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.

actions.name: Greatsword
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5 damage) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6 damage) slashing damage if Portia has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

actions.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6 damage) piercing damage if Portia has more than half of its total hit points remaining.
